titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-476, by Ms. Slaughter.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 165.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 869, H. Res. 850 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 12/6/2007--Reported to House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendar and Committee Reports) to allow consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 2764 (Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2008) on the same day it is presented to the House.
